title: KupaCrypto
author: KupaCrypto
content: Pioneers have been minning for the past few years now and the pi is set to gain value this year, as such more millionaires will be made, so Pioneers mine and grab more coins as much as you can , because something big is about happening this year, tho we are not sure but let's be optimistic it will surely happen this year,As you grabbing pi coins make sure you grab some BTC too so either way we will make this profit together, let's keep minning bro..

comments.author: miner29
comments.body: Quote from: KupaCrypto on February 09, 2023, 07:55:18 AMPioneers have been minning for the past few years now and the pi is set to gain value this year, as such more millionaires will be made, so Pioneers mine and grab more coins as much as you can , because something big is about happening this year, tho we are not sure but let's be optimistic it will surely happen this year,As you grabbing pi coins make sure you grab some BTC too so either way we will make this profit together, let's keep minning bro..This post will not age well for you.

comments.author: swogerino
comments.body: Quote from: miner29 on February 09, 2023, 05:34:20 PMQuote from: KupaCrypto on February 09, 2023, 07:55:18 AMPioneers have been minning for the past few years now and the pi is set to gain value this year, as such more millionaires will be made, so Pioneers mine and grab more coins as much as you can , because something big is about happening this year, tho we are not sure but let's be optimistic it will surely happen this year,As you grabbing pi coins make sure you grab some BTC too so either way we will make this profit together, let's keep minning bro..This post will not age well for you. I do let my wife phone which has no important data at all to mine Pi although I know it won't get far.Just read the news all over coinmarketcap and other similar websites and they all have a red disclaimer suggesting to anyone to be cautious and to do due diligence before investing in such coin.I honestly believe this will go nowhere as it lack community support and it does not solve any real life problem at all.I strongly agree that this post will definitely not age well.

comments.author: adaseb
comments.body: Maybe I am out of the loop but what exactly is this Pi coin? Seems like another fake cell phone mining token according to the above poster. We had plenty of these and most are quickly forgotten after a short while.The fact that it was written in poor English with spelling mistakes and crazy exaggerations leads me to believe that they are paying people to shill this token.

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: Quote from: KupaCrypto on February 09, 2023, 07:55:18 AMPioneers have been minning for the past few years now and the pi is set to gain value this year,Are you a prophet?  Quote from: KupaCrypto on February 09, 2023, 07:55:18 AM as such more millionaires will be made, so Pioneers mine and grab more coins as much as you can , because something big is about happening this year, tho we are not sure but let's be optimistic it will surely happen this year,if you are going to be millionaires. Then why are you wasting time asking us to collect more Pi network shitcoins here?Or perhaps you meant millionaires in terms of pi tokens?

comments.author: KupaCrypto
comments.body: Quote from: miner29 on February 09, 2023, 05:34:20 PMThis post will not age well for you.  Really... Bro enlighten me more why won't it age well for me , is it against the rules of the forum?

comments.author: JayDDee
comments.body: Quote from: KupaCrypto on February 12, 2023, 05:50:29 AMQuote from: miner29 on February 09, 2023, 05:34:20 PMThis post will not age well for you.  Really... Bro enlighten me more why won't it age well for me , is it against the rules of the forum? There have been many before you promoting the same pyramid scheme. You're late to the game so you're just a bag holder. Do a search, the mods usually let one thread run at a time but those scammers were similarly ridiculed.

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: Quote from: KupaCrypto on February 12, 2023, 05:50:29 AM Really... Bro enlighten me more why won't it age well for me , is it against the rules of the forum? What he means is that what you said won't come to be true. Not many will turn into millionaires because of accumulating pi coins as you said. You did nothing against the forum rules though.

comments.author: KupaCrypto
comments.body: Quote from: Bitcoin_Arena on February 12, 2023, 09:23:19 PMWhat he means is that what you said won't come to be true. Not many will turn into millionaires because of accumulating pi coins as you said. You did nothing against the forum rules though. I was really scared I thought it was against the forum rules, well have seen convincing news online and am convinced tho it will happen soon so let's stay tuned.
